descriptions.en: This move effect may be in need of research. Reason: Does this move take into account Abilities such as Huge Power; items such as Choice Band?You can discuss this on the talk page.
descriptions.de: Kraftabsorber heilt beim Anwender KP in Höhe des Angriffswerts des gewählten Zieles, danach wird dessen Angriff um 1 Stufe gesenkt.
